data.text: Wuoda, chik iti malongʼo ne riekona,
eka isik kingʼeyo pogo tiend weche
Nimar dho jachode wacho weche mamit ka mor kich,
to gikone okech ka kedhno
Tiendene ochomo kar tho,
Ok opar ngangʼ yor ngima; yorene ogondore,
Omiyo koro un yawuota, winjauru,
Bed mabor gi dhako ma kamano,
nono to jomoko nono ema inimi tekreni maber moloyo
nono to jomoko nono, ema nocham mwanduni
To e giko mar ngimani inichur achura,
To iniwachi niya, “Mano kaka nasin gi puonj mar rieko!
Ne ok anyal winjo kendo timo weche jopuonjna,
Asechopo e giko mar kethruok marach
Modh pi moa e dapigi iwuon,
Bende ber mondo soknigi omol ka oo oko e yore mag dala,
Ne ni gibedo magi iwuon
Sokoni mondo ogwedhi,
Ojaber ka mwanda, kendo olongʼo ka nyakech,
Wuoda, ere gima omiyo jachode dikaw paroni?
Yore mag dhano nenore ratiro e nyim Jehova Nyasaye,
Timbe mamono mag ngʼama jaricho obedone obadho mamake,
Obiro tho nikech ok oyie mondo orieye,
